Text:
I got this 3 weeks ago on bit torrent monster and at only 683 Megs.

However, I see you obtained that same version and re-muxed it to include the subtitles (and hence the spelling error in "Fall" rather than "Falls.")

Well done though. Nice to see someone who re-packs a title and doesn't claim it as their own upload.

I'm downloading it. Subtitles are sometimes useful.

Thanks.
My error re: "Falls." Not your spelling in error but my lack of concentration.
It is the torrent title in error: "Fool" instead of "Fools."
